long_description: The new Thule Force Alpine roof box features an aerodynamic design with textured skin, a low profile and plenty room to haul your gear to the mountains and ocean. Low-profile design is ideal for carrying snowsports gear and fits easily in garages and parking structures with low ceilings. Aerodynamic shape and the diamond-textured skin on lid of roof box help to reduce drag. Tool-free QuickGrip(TM) mounting system comes pre-installed so you'll be on the road in seconds. QuickGrip system can be mounted on square and round crossbars and most factory racks (see Fit List); attaches with a single, 1-handed motion. Patented, dual-side openings let you access your gear from either side of the box. Locking system features an external lock-assist knob that is easy to use; built-in safety feature means the key can only be removed when the box is fully closed. User-friendly locking system includes an oversize key; a lock is located on each side of the box, and each lock comes with 2 keys. Thule Force Alpine roof box holds 5 - 6 pairs of skis or 2 - 3 snowboards.
short_description: The new Thule Force Alpine roof box features an aerodynamic design with textured skin, a low profile and plenty room to haul your gear to the mountains and ocean.
